text: , son of regent Norizane, was a kugyō or Japanese court noble of the Kamakura period. He held regent positions kampaku from 1273 to 1274 and sessho in 1274. Tadanori and were his sons born by a daughter of Sanjō Kinfusa.三条公房 ==Family== * Father: Kujō Norizane * Mother: Fujiwara Yuko * Wife and Children: ** Wife: Sanjō Kinfusa’s daughter *** Kujō Tadatsugu (1253-?) *** Kujō Tadanori *** Shincho （1266 - 1322） ** Unknown *** Jicho *** Jinkei *** Seikei *** Kakuei *** ???
